â™®: Natural sign. Signifies no change in pitch.

Â·: Dot product. E.g. 12@ Â· 3/2 is 7 i.e. a fifth is seven steps of 12-tone equal temperament.

âŠ•: Reciprocal of the sum of of reciprocals. E.g. 2âŠ•3.

Î±: Interordinal nominal alpha. Î±4 is a semioctave below A4.
Î²: Interordinal nominal beta. Î²4 is a semioctave below B4.
Î³: Interordinal nominal gamma. Î³4 is a semioctave above C4.
